q1: How many miles a day should a player run to be in shape?
q2: 5 miles total. an assortment of sprinting and full speed running.
a2: Do the plays from Real Madrid run that every day?
q3: Probably, but they run about 12 kilometers per game. Do you think you could do that?
a3: I run 12 kilometers before you even have your morning coffee chap.
q4: I don't. I sit and eat bacon rolls whilst you are running 12 KM and he is having his morning coffee.
a4: At what pace do the players of Real Madrid run their kilometers?
